properties.description: Grey Matters Active Ageing are keeping the older community in Helensburgh and Lomond warm and active this winter. They have a ‘Warm Welcome' coffee morning on a Tuesday at 10.30 and a Friday evening Takeaway meal both offering warm drinks/food and even warmer company. They also have over 10 interest groups to tap into during the week and are adding to them all the time including more evening and weekend activities too.
properties.title: Grey Matters Active Ageing

properties.description: Conversation Caf√© - Every Thursday 10.15 - 11.15 Soup and bread will be served and tea/coffee will be available For more information call Christine on 07849 180129
properties.title: Live Argyll Helensburgh Library

properties.address: Located above the MOD Police station in Churchill Square, Helensburgh G84 9HL
properties.description: The Family Hub - while the activities vary, offer morning and afternoon events. A warm welcome to anyone seeking a chat or a friendly cuppa! Monday to Friday, with someone available in the office from 9am to 2.30pm.

hours._text: The Family Hub. Monday to Friday. 9am to 2.30pm.

properties.title: Home Start Lomond

properties.description: From 11.00 on a Thursday. Blairmore Village Hall hosts a weekly “Drop in” on a Thursday morning. Called the Shore Hub, it is a warm and welcoming space for folk to go in for as long as they wish to. There is no charge, and if demand were sufficient, they could extend it to include a soup-and-sandwich lunch.
properties.title: Blairmore Village Hall
